content.intro: Termux mein software install karna, update karna aur manage karna seekhiye. Package manager se aap Python, Git jaise tools install kar sakte hain.

sections.heading: Package Kya Hota Hai?
sections.text:
Package ek ready-made software hai jo aap install kar sakte hain. Jaise mobile mein apps hote hain, waise hi Termux mein packages hote hain.

Examples: Python, Git, Nmap, Curl - yeh sab packages hain.

commands.explanation: Available packages ki latest list download karta hai
Installed packages ko latest version mein update karta hai
Pehle list update, phir packages upgrade - dono ek sath
Python programming language install karta hai
Git version control system install karta hai
Nano text editor install karta hai (beginners ke liye easy)

content.intro: Files edit karne ke liye text editors ka use karna seekhiye. Text editor se aap scripts, configuration files aur notes bana sakte hain.

sections.heading: Text Editor Kya Hai?
sections.text: Text editor ek software hai jo text files create aur edit karne ke liye use hota hai. Jaise mobile mein notepad app hota hai, waise hi terminal mein text editors hote hain.

sections.heading: Nano Editor (Beginners ke liye Best)

commands.explanation: myfile.txt ko nano editor mein open karta hai

sections.text:
Nano Editor mein Important Keys:
• Ctrl + O: File save karne ke liye
• Ctrl + X: Editor se exit karne ke liye
• Ctrl + K: Line cut karne ke liye
• Ctrl + U: Cut kiya hua text paste karne ke liye
• Ctrl + W: Text search karne ke liye

content.intro: Linux mein file permissions kya hote hain aur kaise manage karte hain. Permissions decide karte hain ki file ke sath kya kar sakte hain.

sections.heading: File Permissions Kya Hain?
sections.text:
Permissions decide karte hain ki file ke sath kya kar sakte hain:

• Read (r): File ko read kar sakte hain
• Write (w): File mein changes kar sakte hain
• Execute (x): File ko run kar sakte hain (scripts ke liye)

sections.heading: Permissions Check Karna

commands.explanation: Files ki permissions, size, date ke sath list dikhata hai

sections.text:
Permission Format: -rwxr-xr--
• First character: File type (- = file, d = directory)
• Next 3: Owner permissions (rwx)
• Next 3: Group permissions (r-x)
• Last 3: Others permissions (r--)

commands.explanation: script.py file ko executable (runnable) bana deta hai
File se write permission remove kar deta hai
Owner ko full access, others ko read+execute access
